title: Writing Table
description: Writing Table; Bernard II van Risenburgh (French, after 1696 - about 1766, master before 1730); Paris, France; about 1755; Oak and fir veneered with tulipwood, kingwood, and amaranth; drawers of mahogany; gilt-bronze mounts; modern leather panel; 74.9 x 96.2 x 57.6 cm (29 1/2 x 37 7/8 x 22 11/16 in.); 65.DA.1; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
